node.title: Police concerned about missing Central Otago man's well-being
node.description: Police are appealing for the public's help to find a missing Central Otago man.
node.content:
["Police are appealing for the public's help to find a missing Central Otago man.", "", "
Wayne Hammond Photo: SUPPLIED/ NZ Police
", "Wayne Hammond was last seen in Clyde yesterday morning.", "Police and his family have concerns for the 50-year-old's well-being.", "Land and water searches are being carried out by Search and Rescue teams today.", "A police spokesperson said they were continuing to assess information about Hammond's whereabouts.", ""We have got a number of searches out in the field today and they are conducting land and water searches," they said.", ""We're continuing to assess information and figure out the best approach."", "Anyone with information or who might have seen Hammond is asked to contact police on 105 quoting job number: P048471135."]
